results.p: 4 days ago — 2 meanings: 1. close and careful attention; notice (often in the phrases give, pay, or take heed) 2. to pay close attention to.
results.t: HEED definition and meaning | Collins English Dictionary

results.p: To heed something is to listen to it, pay careful attention to it, or otherwise observe or acknowledge it in some way—and often to take action on it.
